content.text:
I'm not sure whether this is a bug or whether I'm misunderstanding the /notifications page, but I don't see any notifications for *any* replies to %9O9CXav+w+/tzLjcskCaOZLcMmuX9jRGXoii9U1SwmM=.sha256. Is that bad?

I tried to dig into the code but it looks like most of the implementation might be coming from how Patchcore ( #patchcore ) handles backlinks, and a `dest` property I'm unfamiliar with. Can anyone guide me to the offending code or help me understand my misunderstanding?
